about.title: About BetApp
about.intro: BetApp is a modern web application designed for sports enthusiasts who love prediction, competition, and strategy. Our mission is to bring excitement and analytical thinking together in one seamless experience.

goal.title: Our Goal
goal.text: To make sports predictions engaging, fair, and community-driven. BetApp provides both casual users and advanced players with the tools to track, compare, and improve their prediction accuracy.

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.text: Real-time match data, detailed analytics, and a transparent betting system — all wrapped in an intuitive interface built with cutting-edge web technologies.

community.title: Join the Community
community.text: Compete with your friends, climb the leaderboard, and prove your sports knowledge. Whether you’re a casual player or a statistic lover, BetApp has a place for you.

question1.title: What is BetApp?
question1.text: BetApp is a modern betting platform that allows users to predict match outcomes, manage their wagers, and compete with friends in a safe and engaging environment.

question2.title: Is BetApp free to use?
question2.text: Absolutely. You can register, browse matches, and participate in public games for free. Some advanced analytics or tournaments may require an upgraded account in the future.

question3.title: How can I reset my password?
question3.text: Simply go to the login page and click on “Forgot Password?”. You’ll receive an email with instructions to securely reset it.

question4.title: Can I contact support?
question4.text: Yes! Our support team is available 24/7. Just visit the Contact section or email us at support@betapp.com.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.text: BetApp collects basic personal information such as your username, email address, and activity data. This helps us improve user experience and maintain account security.

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
2.text: Your information is used to personalize your experience, provide secure authentication, and enhance platform functionality. We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

3.title: 3. Data Protection
3.text: All sensitive information is encrypted and securely stored. Our team follows strict data protection procedures to prevent unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure.

4.title: 4. Cookies
4.text: We use cookies to analyze traffic, remember preferences, and optimize performance. You can disable cookies in your browser settings at any time.

5.title: 5. Contact
5.text: If you have any questions about this policy, please reach out to us at privacy@betapp.com.

1.title: 1. General Refund Conditions
1.text: BetApp offers refunds only in specific cases related to technical errors or accidental duplicate payments. Refunds are not available for completed bets or digital services already delivered.

2.title: 2. Refund Requests
2.text: To request a refund, contact our support team at billing@betapp.com within 7 days of the transaction. Include your username, payment ID, and a brief explanation.

3.title: 3. Processing Time
3.text: Refund requests are reviewed within 5–10 business days. Once approved, the amount will be returned to your original payment method.

4.title: 4. Non-Refundable Situations
4.text: Refunds will not be issued for intentional misuse, violation of BetApp Terms of Service, or dissatisfaction with bet outcomes or predictions.

5.title: 5. Contact
5.text: For more details, please email our finance department at refunds@betapp.com.
